<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Manage, equip, unequip your gear.

## /gear equip

**Usage**

- `/gear equip gear_setup:<string> [items:<string>] [item:<string>] [preset:<string>] [quantity:<integer>] [auto:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | Yes | The gear setup want to select. | - |
| `items` | `string` | No | A list of equippable items to equip. | - |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to equip. | - |
| `preset` | `string` | No | The gear preset you want to select. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to equip (optional). | - |
| `auto` | `string` | No | Automatically equip the best gear you have for a certain style. | - |

## /gear unequip

**Usage**

- `/gear unequip gear_setup:<string> [item:<string>] [all:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | Yes | The gear setup want to select. | - |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to unequip. | - |
| `all` | `boolean` | No | Unequip everything in this setup? | - |

## /gear stats

**Usage**

- `/gear stats gear_setup:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | Yes | A list of equippable items to check the stats of. | - |

## /gear pet

**Usage**

- `/gear pet [equip:<string>] [unequip:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `equip` | `string` | No | Equip a pet. | - |
| `unequip` | `boolean` | No | Unequip your pet. | - |

## /gear view

**Usage**

- `/gear view setup:<string> [text_format:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `setup` | `string` | Yes | The setup you want to view. | - |
| `text_format` | `boolean` | No | Do you want to see your gear in plaintext? | - |

## /gear swap

**Usage**

- `/gear swap setup_one:<string> setup_two:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `setup_one` | `string` | Yes | The setup you want to switch. | - |
| `setup_two` | `string` | Yes | The setup you want to switch. | - |

## /gear best_in_slot

**Usage**

- `/gear best_in_slot stat:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `stat` | `string` | Yes | The stat to view the BiS items for. | - |
